name: For Valhalla
description:
Protect your base and survive the ragnarok with a friend in this collaborative multiplayer. Choose play as a Warrior or a blacksmith Dwarf with unique abilities. 

Giants are invading your base! 

To defeat them you can play with these two classes: 

With the warrior you can cut wood, mine metals and throw axes in giants trying to burn your defenses. 

The Dwarf can craft itens and fix destroyed walls.

Controls/Instructions:

Interact with Anvil, Wood, Ores and Walls: Press X

Collect Itens: Press Z

Drop Itens: Press Z

Walk: WASD
